alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:43AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Oglala Lakota and western Bennett Counties through 215 AM MDT... At 143 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles southeast of Kyle to Porcupine to 3 miles west of White Clay. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Yellow Bear Canyon around 155 AM MDT. Batesland around 200 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Allen and Swett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
